outcomes.outcome:
The crew maroons you.
Turn to 177
Indiscipline: reduce Crew Quality by one step
Invigoration: upgrade Crew Quality by one step
Inspiration: upgrade Crew Quality two steps

section.p: The four categories of Crew Quality are poor, average, good and excellent. Crew Quality cannot go below poor or above excellent.
When ready to set sail again (assuming you aren’t marooned!) .
